verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w have|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w mothers|strong="H0517"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* grievous illnesses: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w lamented|strong="H5594"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w dung|strong="H1828"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w carcasses|strong="H5038"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* meat \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* air, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* feasting, \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* thou \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* comfort \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H0622"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* commiserations.

\w Both|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w lamented|strong="H5594"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7139"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w bald|strong="H7139"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w break|strong="H6536"\w* bread \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* mourneth, \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*, \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* take \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w mirth|strong="H8057"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* bridegroom, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: Wherefore hath \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*? \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*? \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

Thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* forsook \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* adored \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* forsook \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w also|strong="H3820"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w worse|strong="H7451"\w* \w than|strong="H1115"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* walketh \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* perverseness \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* rest.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* fishers, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fish|strong="H1770"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* hunters, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* holes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* defiled \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w carcasses|strong="H5038"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w idols|strong="H8251"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H5797"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4581"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* tribulation: \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Surely|strong="H0389"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w possessed|strong="H5157"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* hath \w not|strong="H0369"\w* profited \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* unto \w himself|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w once|strong="H6471"\w* cause \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* shew \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
